text: Italia 1 is an Italian commercial television station on the Mediaset network. It is oriented especially at young people. ==Programs== ===North American TV series=== * 15/Love * 24 - from season 5 - the previous seasons aired on Rete 4. * 3rd Rock from the Sun (1999-2005) * 7th Heaven (Settimo Cielo) * According to Jim (La vita secondo Jim) * Angel * Arrested Development (Ti presento i miei...) * Automan * Barney & Friends (Barney) (1994) * Beverly Hills, 90210 (1992-2001) * Bionic Woman * Blue Water High * Boston Public * Buffy the Vampire Slayer (Buffy l'Ammazzavampiri) (2000-2005) * Californication (2008-present) * CHiPs (1982-1989) * CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (CSI: Scena del Crimine) * CSI: Miami * CSI: NY * Dawson's Creek (2000-2003) * Dexter (2008-present) * Dharma & Greg * Diff'rent Strokes (Arnold) (1984-1990) * Drake & Josh (2009-present) * Everwood * Family Matters (8 sotto un tetto) (1992-2001) * The Flash (Flash) * Flipper (Le nuove avventure di Flipper) * The Fresh Prince of Bel Air (Willy il principe di Bel Air) (1992-1999) * Full House (Gli amici di papà) (1996-2002) * Gilmore Girls (Una mamma per amica) * Gossip Girl * Grey's Anatomy * Growing Pains (Genitori in blue jeans) (1989-1996) * H2O: Just Add Water (2008-present) * Hannah Montana (2007-present) * Happy Days (1982-1991) * Heroes (2007-present) * House (Dr. House - Medical Division) - seasons 1-2 and first 15 episodes of season 3 - the remaining episodes aired on Canale 5. * How I Met Your Mother (E Alla Fine Arriva Mamma) * iCarly (2008-present) * The Incredible Hulk (Hulk) (1982-1986) * Instant Star * The Invisible Man (2003-2006) * The Jeffersons (I Jefferson) (1982-1990) * Kyle XY * Killer Instinct * Kingdom Hospital * Knight Rider (Supercar) (1987-1992) * Life (2008-present) * Life Goes On (Una famiglia come tante) * Living with Fran (A casa di Fran) (200?-200?) * MacGyver (1988-1996) * Magnum P.I.
